Home.title: Ku soo dhowow Hagaha Barashada Python
Home.subtitle: Waddada dhammeystiran ee lagu noqdo horumariye Python
Home.description: Hagahani wuxuu bixiyaa hab habaysan oo lagu barto barnaamijyada Python, laga bilaabo asaasiyaadka ilaa iyo inta laga diyaar garoobayo shaqada horumariye.

beginner.title: U Fiican Bilowgalayaasha
beginner.description: Ku bilow asaasiyaadka oo dhis aasaas adag

practical.title: Mashruucyo Dhab ah
practical.description: Baro adigoo dhisaya mashruucyo dhab ah oo adag

comprehensive.title: Waddo Dhammeystiran
comprehensive.description: Laga bilaabo asaasiyaadka ilaa horumarinta xirfadeed oo leh Git, APIs, iyo in ka badan

Guide.title: Hagaha Barashada Python
Guide.intro: Hagaha talaabo-tallaabada ah ee lagu noqdo horumariye Python oo khibrad leh

step1.title: Baro Asaasiyaadka
step1.content: Marka hore, waxaad u baahan doontaa inaad barato waxyaabaha ugu sahlan sida statements-ka daabacaadda, fikradaha aasaasiga ah ee barnaamijyada. Waxaa jira laba hab oo la taliyay:

options.option1: Daawo Fireship (muuqaalada degdegga ah) oo si toos ah uga hel waayo-aragnimo. Tani waxay ku shaqeysaa haddii aad leedahay qaab waxbarasho oo dhab ah.
options.option2: Samee barnaamij ama koorso habeysan. Ikhtiyaarada la taliyay waxaa ka mid ah Mosh ama Tech with Tim. Mosh wuxuu bixiyaa tababbar bilowga ah oo heer sare ah oo daboolaya asaasiyaadka Python.

step2.title: Dhis Mashruucyo Fudud
step2.content: Haddaba, hel waayo-aragnimo wax-ku-ool ah oo leh mashaariic yaryar. Isku day inaad sameyso ciyaaro aasaasi ah sida tic-tac-toe ama ciyaaro ku salaysan shabakad sida Connect 4.

step3.title: Baro Git
step3.content: SI AAD U NOQOTO HORUMARIYE WAA INAAD FAHAMTO GIT. WAY KA FUDUDAHAY SIDII AY U MUUQATAY. Fireship wuxuu leeyahay muuqaallo badan oo waxtar leh oo sharxaya Git iyo sida si waxtar leh loogu isticmaalo.

step4.title: Qaado Mashruucyo Caqabad leh
step4.content: Hadda oo aad fahamtay asaasiyaadka, iskugu dheelli tir mashaariic dhib badan oo bilowga u muuqda inay dhaafsiisan yihiin heerkaaga xirfadeed ee hadda.

details.detail1: Dooro mashaariic ku dhiirrigeliya ama kugu dhaliyo xiisahaaga.
details.detail2: Mashruucaagu waa inuu ku darsado fikrado cusub sida:

examples.example1: Bogga internetka ee aasaasiga ah ee isticmaalaya API dadweynaha si uu u muujiyo macluumaadka
examples.example2: Ciyaar leh interface graphics heerka sare ah

step5.title: Dhis Codka Kaabaysha Buuxa
step5.content: Waa waqtigii la isku keeni lahaa wax walba oo la abuuri lahaa codsiga kaabaysha buuxa oo leh isticmaalka Git ee habboon, keydka xogta, iyo bog web oo xirfadle ah oo isticmaalaya HTML, CSS, iyo suurtagalka JavaScript.

step6.title: Ku Tababbaro Wareysiyada Farsamada
step6.content: Hadda oo aad tahay horumariye, u diyaargarow wareysiyada farsamada adoo ku tababbarnaya qaab-dhismeedyada xogta iyo algorithms-ka. Kuwani way adag yihiin laakiin waa muhiim shaqo-codsiyada. Ku tababbaro bogagga sida LeetCode ama NeetCode.

channels.title: Kanaalada YouTube
channels.fireship: Fireship - Tababarro degdeg ah oo kooban
channels.techwithTim: Tech with Tim - Python sida ugu dhakhsaha badan ee suurtogalka ah (Baro Python ~75 Daqiiqo)
channels.mosh: Mosh Python Course - Python Full Course for Beginners (6 saacadood, oo loo kala qaybiyay qaybaha)
channels.brocode: Bro Code - Koorsada buuxda ee Python oo bilaash ah, faahfaahsan laakiin kooban

git.title: Ilaha Git
git.explanation: Fireship: Git oo lagu sharxay 100 Ilbiriqsi

practice.title: Goobaha Tababbarka
practice.leetcode: LeetCode - Ku tababbaro su'aalaha wareysiga iyo algorithms
practice.neetcode: NeetCode - Dhibaatooyin dheeraad ah iyo xalal

courses.title: Koorsooyinka La Taliyay
courses.harvard: Harvard Computer Science (CS50) - Hordhaca Sayniska Kombiyuutarka

About.title: Iga Waran
About.subtitle: Abuuraha hagaha Python ee adiga
About.biography: Waxaan ku xishooneynaa inaan caawiyo kuwa kale inay bartaan coding oo ay noqdaan horumariyayaal guuleysta. Sanado waayo-aragnimo ah oo ku jira horumarinta Python iyo wax barista, waxaan abuuray hagahan si aan u bixiyo hab habaysan oo lagu barto barnaamijyada.

contact.title: La Xiriir
contact.description: Ma qabtaa su'aalo ama ma u baahan tahay hagitaan shakhsiyeed? Fadlan nala soo xiriir!
